ygData.subject: Tome of Magi Lor WEB PAGE...
ygData.msgSnippet: I wish to create a Tome of Magi Lor web page. If you have or know where I can get a CGI/HTML script that will allow others to add their comments to this web
ygData.messageBody:
I wish to create a "Tome of Magi Lor" web page. If you have or know where I
can get a CGI/HTML script that will allow others to add their comments to
this web page please let me know. What I am looking for is a CGI data base
that allows external entries to be added then automatically updates a FAQ
sheet. The automatic part is a must cause I like to play EQ too much to get
stuck updating a web page. I can screen the page and omit others. I would
really like a CIG data base that would allow me to have a login and password
security that way those pesky fighters could not steal information. Also I
would be able to track who said what about quests or items to glean more
info from then if needed.


Elkantar Keeper of the Tome of Magi Lore
